histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.ApiActionType
histogram.summary: Records the action type of the request. Recorded when a topics request is handled in `BrowsingTopicsService`. Redirects (for fetch and xhr) will be counted as separate histogram entries.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.BrowsingTopicsState.LoadFinishStatus
histogram.summary: Records the load finish status of BrowsingTopicsState. Recored when the state is loaded from the file at the start of each browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.DidNotOccurAtScheduledTime.CalculationTimerIsRunning
histogram.summary: If the scheduled topics calculation fails to run on time, records whether the calculation scheduling timer is running. This check occurs each time a new tab is created. The metric is recorded at most once per browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.DidNotOccurAtScheduledTime.DaysSinceSessionStart
histogram.summary: If the scheduled topics calculation fails to run on time, records the elapsed time (in days) since the profile session start. This check occurs each time a new tab is created. The metric is recorded at most once per browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.DidNotOccurAtScheduledTime.HoursSinceScheduledTime
histogram.summary: If the scheduled topics calculation fails to run on time, records the elapsed time (in hours) from the scheduled time to the time of detection. This check occurs each time a new tab is created. The metric is recorded at most once per browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.DidNotOccurAtScheduledTime.RemainingDaysInCalculationTimer
histogram.summary: If the scheduled topics calculation fails to run on time, records the remaining time (in days) in the calculation scheduling timer. This check occurs each time a new tab is created. The metric is recorded only when the number is positive, and is recorded at most once per browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.DidNotOccurAtScheduledTime.RemainingTimeInCalculationTimerIsPositive
histogram.summary: If the scheduled topics calculation fails to run on time, records whether records whether remaining time in the calculation scheduling timer is positive. This check occurs at the end of each navigation. The metric is recorded at most once per browser session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.EligibleDistinctHistoryHostsCount
histogram.summary: Records the count of distinct history hosts that are eligible for topics calculation. Recorded during each (weekly) topics calculation after the observation domains are derived. In case of a calculation failure (e.g. permission denied, etc.), this metric won't be recorded.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.FirstTry.CalculatorResultStatus
histogram.summary: Records the browsing topics calculation result status (i.e. success, or the failure reason). Topics calculations can typically occur weekly, but can also be manually triggered from the topics-internals page, or can be retries of a previously failed calculation (due to hanging or data race). Recorded for the first try of a calculation (i.e. separated from the timeout retry) after the calculation completes, or when it's detected to be hanging, or when it's canceled due to data races or browser shutdown.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.Hanging.RetryNumber
histogram.summary: Records the number of consecutive retries for a topic calculation (initial attempt = 0). Recorded when a topic calculation times out.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.HistoryTopicsCount
histogram.summary: Records the count of topics derived from history hosts in the past epoch (week). Recorded during each (weekly) topics calculation after the top topics are derived. In case of a calculation failure (e.g. permission denied, etc.), this metric won't be recorded.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.ObservationContextDomainsCountPerTopTopic
histogram.summary: Records the count of context domains for each of the calculated top topics. This won't exceed the cap number `kBrowsingTopicsMaxNumberOfApiUsageContextDomainsToKeepPerTopic`. Recorded once for each calculated top topics, during each (weekly) topics calculation after the observation domains are derived. In case of a calculation failure (e.g. permission denied; candidate topic was blocked; etc.), this metric won't be recorded.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.Started.RetryNumber
histogram.summary: Records the number of consecutive retries for a topic calculation (initial attempt = 0). Recorded when a topic calculation starts.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.TimeBetweenCalculations
histogram.summary: Records the time between top topic calculations. Recorded when a topic calculation finishes and results from a prior epoch are available. This metric is recorded even in case of a calculation failure (e.g. permission denied, etc.).

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.TimeoutRetry.CalculatorResultStatus
histogram.summary: Records the browsing topics calculation result status (i.e. success, or the failure reason), for those that are triggered due to the previous calculation timed out. Topics calculations can typically occur weekly, but can also be manually triggered from the topics-internals page, or can be retries of a previously failed calculation (due to hanging or data race). Recorded when the timeout-retried topics calculation completes, or when it's detected to be hanging (again), or when it's canceled due to data races or browser shutdown.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.EpochTopicsCalculation.TopTopicsCountBeforePadding
histogram.summary: Records the count of derived top topics before random ones are padded. Recorded during each (weekly) topics calculation after the top topics are derived. In case of a calculation failure (e.g. permission denied, etc.), this metric won't be recorded.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Fetch.InitialUrlRequest.Result
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics at the BrowsingTopicsURLLoaderInterceptor layer for the fetch() request for the initial URL, the success status or the failure reason.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Fetch.RedirectedUrlRequest.Result
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics at the BrowsingTopicsURLLoaderInterceptor layer for the fetch() request for a redirected URL, the success status or the failure reason.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.JavaScriptAPI.TimeToResolve
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes for document.browsingTopics() to resolve. Recorded each time the promise is resolved.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.OverrideList.FileLoadResult
histogram.summary: The result of a single attempt to load the override list from disk, and parse it into a native object. Recorded once for every attempted load. Note that if an attempt fails it will not be re-attempted for the same file until the next browsing session, but a successful load will be recorded one or more times during a browsing session.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.OverrideList.UsedOverride
histogram.summary: When the override list is checked, whether it contained the given input.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.PageLoad.OnTopicsFirstInvoked.RedirectCount
histogram.summary: When Topics API is invoked on a page load for the first time, records the number of previous pages that were loaded via client-side redirects (without user activation).

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.PageLoad.OnTopicsFirstInvoked.RedirectWithTopicsInvokedCount
histogram.summary: When Topics API is invoked on a page load for the first time, records the number of previous pages that were loaded via client-side redirects (without user activation) that also invoked the Topics API.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Result.FakeTopicCount
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics is a success, the number of those topics that were returned (weren't filtered) that were fake (noised).

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Result.FilteredTopicCount
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics is a success, the number of those topics that were not returned because they were filtered due to the caller not having observed the user on a site about that topic recently.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Result.RealTopicCount
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics is a success, the number of those topics that were returned (weren't filtered) that were real topics (as opposed to noised).

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.Result.Status
histogram.summary: When retrieving topics at the BrowsingTopicsService layer (applicable to both javascript and headers), the success status or the failure reason.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.SiteDataStorage.FileSize.KB
histogram.summary: The size in kilobytes of the `BrowsingTopics` SQL database file. Recorded when the database is lazily and successfully initialized.

histogram.name: BrowsingTopics.SiteDataStorage.InitStatus
histogram.summary: Records initialization status of BrowsingTopics SiteDataStorage database. Recorded when the database is lazily initialised when the first operation is encountered.
